name: Traffic Racer: Car Simulator
description:
Traffic Racer:Car simulator
High speed Car racer cross all the traffic without any accident.in this game have multiple car for racing.you can select from the game panel.Different game mode you can select from it.city environment is very beautiful and have a multiple challenging level.same it is a snow mode.Desert mode also a good game play and have a difficult challenging level.
first select the mode and then start a race and cross the others game and reach your destination.in this game you can drive a car full speed and complete the given mission target as kilometer in a few minutes.cross all the car and buses without destroy them.
Game Feature:
Good game play.
Realistic sound effect of the car.
Stunning HD graphics
Beautiful environment.
Multiple challenging level.
